scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a man with a bandaged arm, wearing a blue tunic and dark leggings, walking towards a field of wheat. He is accompanied by a figure in full armor, holding a staff, and another man in a red tunic and white turban. The background features a row of stylized trees. The overall impression is of a journey or a pastoral scene, possibly related to agricultural labor or a biblical narrative.
scene_interpretation: This scene likely illustrates a biblical episode, possibly related to the parable of the sower or a narrative involving agricultural work and divine providence. The injured man might represent a figure in need of divine intervention or a lesson being imparted.
